com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. OPTIONAL {?s dcterms:description ?desc}. FILTER (!BOUND(?desc)). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: description is a required property for dataset
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: no description defined for this dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcterms:description ?o. FILTER(!isLiteral(?o)) BIND(dcterms:description AS ?p). }

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. FILTER(!(EXISTS { ?s dcterms:title ?title})). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: dcterms:title is a required property for Dataset
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: dcterms:title is a required property for Dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcterms:title ?o. FILTER(!isLiteral(?o)) BIND(dcterms:title AS ?p). }

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX adms:<http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. FILTER(!(EXISTS { ?s adms:contactPoint ?cPoint})). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: adms:contactPoint is a recommended property for Dataset
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: adms:contactPoint is a recommended property for Dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX adms:<http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s adms:contactPoint ?o. FILTER(!isUri(?o)). BIND(adms:contactPoint AS ?p). }

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX adms:<http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s adms:contactPoint ?o. ?o ?pred ?val. FILTER(!EXISTS {?o a <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#VCard>}). BIND(adms:contactPoint AS ?p). }

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: dcat:distribution is a recommended property for Dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcat:distribution ?o. ?o ?pred ?val. FILTER(!EXISTS {?o a dcat:Distribution}). BIND(dcat:distribution AS ?p). }

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. FILTER(!(EXISTS { ?s dcat:keyword ?key})). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: dcat:keyword is a recommended property for Dataset
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: dcat:keyword is a recommended property for Dataset

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. FILTER(!(EXISTS { ?s dcterms:publisher ?pub})). BIND(rdf:type AS ?p). BIND(dcat:Dataset AS ?o). }

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: dcterms:publisher is a recommended property for Dataset

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> SELECT ?s (rdf:type AS ?p) (dcat:Dataset AS ?o) WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcterms:publisher ?pub. } GROUP BY ?s HAVING(COUNT(?pub) > 1)
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: dcterms:publisher has maximum cardinality of 1 for Dataset
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: dcterms:publisher has maximum cardinality of 1 for Dataset

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX foaf:<http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT ?s (dcterms:publisher as ?p) ?o WHERE { ?s a dcat:Dataset. ?s dcterms:publisher ?o. ?o ?pred ?val. FILTER(!EXISTS {?o a foaf:Agent}). }

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: name is a required property for Agent

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX foaf:<http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a foaf:Agent. ?s foaf:name ?o. FILTER(!isLiteral(?o)). BIND (foaf:name as ?p) }

PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX foaf:<http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a foaf:Agent. FILTER(!EXISTS {?s dcterms:type ?type}). BIND (rdf:type as ?p). BIND (foaf:Agent as ?o). }
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.description: type is a recommended property for Agent
com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.message: type is a recommended property for Agent

com.tenforce.lodms.transformers.validato.sparqlQuery: PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX dcat:<http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#> PREFIX foaf:<http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT ?s ?p ?o WHERE { ?s a foaf:Agent. ?s dcterms:type ?o. FILTER(!isUri(?o)). BIND (dcterms:type as ?p) }
